tool_description: Calculates adjustment factors between subject property and comparables based on differences in key characteristics like size, bedrooms, bathrooms, and age.

subject_lot_size.description: Subject property lot size in square feet

comparable_square_footage.description: Array of comparable property square footages

comparable_bedrooms.description: Array of comparable property bedroom counts

comparable_bathrooms.description: Array of comparable property bathroom counts

comparable_year_built.description: Array of comparable property construction years

comparable_lot_sizes.description: Array of comparable property lot sizes in square feet

price_per_sqft_adjustment.description: Price adjustment per square foot difference

age_adjustment_per_year.description: Price adjustment per year of age difference

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All comparable property arrays must have the same number of elements.
Invalid property characteristics: Square footage, bedrooms, and lot size must be positive integers; bathrooms must be positive numbers.
Invalid year built: Construction years must be between 1800 and current year.
Invalid adjustment values: All adjustment factors must be positive numbers.
usage: Provide subject property characteristics and arrays of comparable property features. Optionally customize adjustment factors. Returns calculated adjustment amounts for each comparable property.

total_adjustments.description: Total dollar adjustment for each comparable property

size_adjustments.description: Square footage adjustment for each comparable

bedroom_adjustments.description: Bedroom count adjustment for each comparable

bathroom_adjustments.description: Bathroom count adjustment for each comparable
